item.description: We will be kayaking up the brook about 2 miles, as the brook narrows you will think that you are in the wilderness. You will see an assortment of birds, possibly turtles or even otters. This paddle will have to start early because we have to do this at high tide, so we have to meet by 7:30 and be on the water by 8. We will meet at the playground in the park. It will take 2-3 hours. Life vests are mandatory. Please read and understand the Liability Waiver.

group.name: Rhode Island Hiking Club " Walks and Rambles "

item.name: Kayak Buckeye Brook, Conimicut Point Park, Warwick
